Reviews.Title: Style slimmed to perfection
Reviews.Author: ZeeMan
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera today so it won't reflect too much on technical aspects/features. First of all I want to say that the picture featured here and Best Buy for L200 isn't correct. If you want to see the accurate picture then find L210 model and L200 looks exactly like that model. Only difference between the two model is L200 has Digital Image Stabilizer and L210 has Dual Stabilizer (both optical and digital).I was really surprised at how small this camera is. I know lot of people actually coomplains of the compactness of some digital cameras, now I see their reason for complaint. Because it really does feel like it might slip and fall. But I like compact/thin cameras so it was big plus for me.It comes with an AC adapter so you are not stuck with USB cable to recharge the camera through your computer. Also included in the package is A/V cable to view pictures or video directly through TV monitor.Manual that comes with the package isn't much help since it's just a quick reference with 10 other languages. So you need to download the manual through the CD-ROM and it is 102 page worth of info that needs to be digested before actually appreciating all the features this little camera comes with. I took about 30 picture today and all of them look superb and I was twicking with different settings and modes.Best reason to get this camera is the price.Update: I have been using this camera for 15 days and I love all the quick scene modes and program mode. Auto mode does everything really well, too. One complaint I've is that it doesn't let you delete a shot during preview. For example, after you've taken a shot you can view it from 1-3 sec but you won't be able to delete the shot then rather have to go to picture view to delete. But I'm very satisfied with the quality pictures.Update 12/05/2008: Still satisfied and still 5-stars. I do have one suggestion though: I found that leaving the setting on AUTO mode or Scene Mode is the best option. Also, if one turns off the flash then there's no guarantee if the picture would look blurry or not. Unless one have surgeon precision hands or a tripod, then don't risk setting the flash off. There's DIS (digital image stabilizer) which is for low lighting condition without flash and the image isn't blurry but that takes few seconds to actually take the shot, so not a good option on the fly. But with auto flash on the pictures are of amazing quality.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great price!
Reviews.Author: K. Hare "kehloves"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get a new camera before I went to a concert, and I have to tell you, for what you pay, it's great. It's so easy to use, and I love the settings on it. You can pick what size you want your pictures to be. I've now gone to two concerts, and the pictures turned out amazing. I can remember those concerts better because of the quality of these pictures. If you buy this camera, you won't be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Excellent, highly recommended camera
Reviews.Author: T. Sirage
Reviews.Content: This camera has so many amazing features and its pictures are very clear and sharp. this camera is truly the best for the money your paying. Ive been using it for close to 4 months and i must say it has been amazing. the software that comes with it is very very sophisticated and amazing has so many options, it works like professional photo and vidoe editing programs which you have to pay for. Overall, best camera for the money and quality is impecable.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: Azhar
Reviews.Content: Well Samsung does it again. I am a big samsung fan, everything to samsung, jumpdrives, dvd burners, computer monitors and tvs. Now the digital Camera. To give you an idea of how good this camera really is I can say with out a doubt that its is comparable to the and beats the SONY DSC-w150 which is about a 180 dollar camera. Dont get me wrong sonys are awesome cameras also. But this camera actually makes as good or better picture as the sony. Though only thing is that it lacks a few features that the sony does have, other than that for a basic camera, this L200 will not disappiont you.The camera comes with a usb/charging cable and the battery itself, Also has pictBridge for the printers and face detection, many different scene settings including 2 settings you can program your self to your likeing. After you have taken a picture u can do small editing such as brigtening, red eye, saturation, and contrast. You can even make the effects on pictures after you have taken them such as Black and White, Sepia, etc. Also, the camera feels really solid, doesnt feel cheap or plasticy, it has a strong outer aluminum casing. Small enough to fit in your pocket with easy nothing that will hook on you or catch on to your clothing.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: D. C. Makely
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that had enough flash power to take pictures in dark clubs and bars on nights out with my friends and this delivered! It stands up to being at the bottom of my purse with no case. The picture quality is of course great and so was the price. Any Digital SLR owners looking for a great camera they can actually carry around with them, this is the one!

Reviews.Title: buy it!
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: great camera, fun and easy to use. I don't really have steady hands but all the pictures come out clear and perfect. I would definitely recommend people to give it a try.  It's a really good price for a 10MP camera. Don't forget to buy SD memory card (does not come with camera)

Reviews.Title: Great buy.
Reviews.Author: Alex Bonaparte
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera last month and have been in love with it ever since. I strongly recommend it for anyone who likes to take pictures, but is not -- nor intends to be -- a professional photographer. It also fits quite snugly in just about any pocket.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality and un-reliable
Reviews.Author: P. Rishel
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera for about 5 months.  It worked OK for the 1st 2 months.  I was very disappointed with the picture quality as pictures were often blurry, exposed badly, or out of focus.  After about 2 months of use the camera malfunctioned in that the lens would not open when you turned the camera on.  The camera would beep and turn back off.  I sent it back to Samsung for repair.  The return and repair process went very well.  When we got the camera back it malfunctioned again on the first use.  This time the lens would not retract when the camera was switched off.  I tried to contact the seller (Electronic Expo) for a return and was told that the return date had passed (30 days).  Now I will try to get back in touch with Samsung to try to get either a refund or a replacement.  This camera has not met my minimal expectations.  My photographer friends tell me to buy Canon or Nikon.  Next time I will stick with those recommendations.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for it's class/type
Reviews.Author: Russell Smith
Reviews.Content: For the type of camera it is (simple digital, for vacation pics/family pics, etc) it's GREAT!  we haven't charged it yet, using it here and there for about 2 weeks now.  very small and light.  takes great pictures for the price, night pictures, day pictures.  very nice camera.  my wife and i bought it just to get simple pictures of our new 6 month old, and everyday stuff.  It's not a Canon Rebel, but for the price, it's a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Nice Gift!
Reviews.Author: D. Carlson
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift and was happy with the results..the photos were sharp and clear.  Would recommend for this price range.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Heather Allen
Reviews.Content: I am a total picture taker and this camera totally delivers. I recently upgraded from the 6.0 mp samsung and this is much more compact and the learning curve was easy. I am a scrapbooker and let me tell you the picture quality is amazing!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: KO
Reviews.Content: I had previously purchased a samsung for my boyfriend and I liked it so much that I purchased on for myself. I love how small it is and although if your not totaly electronics savy, it's still pretty manageable. I had a hard time with the timer and trying to figure out why there was a delay in the flash, but I do love this camera and it's great picture quality! I would definitly get another samsung camera even though I'm a sony lover!Best camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: A Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Karen Tonnesen "Baggy"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this Samsung camera for a X-mas present was fantastic! Great pictures and a whole lot more for a great price, Thinking of 1 for myself!!

Reviews.Title: Find Something Better
Reviews.Author: Intuitions
Reviews.Content: I bought this out of Macy's vending machine a year ago.  I must say (while it lasted) it was a really nice camera, great image quality and the videos  were excellent.  One day the lens got stuck out and the camera would not work at all.  I didn't own it long, but I can say it won't last.  Pass and get a brand name that has made cameras for years.  I'm sorry but, it's an honest review.  If you're lucky, you may get one that will last... mine did not.

Reviews.Title: Samsung L200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Bater
Reviews.Content: Samsung L200 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Black)Great Camera for the money. Images are crisp and the camera has a lot of adaptability - auto, program, manual modes are great for any lighting situation.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: S. Moghadaszadeh
Reviews.Content: Excellent product.  Priced at a great deal.  Arrived about 3-4 days after purchase date.  Nicely packaged and shipped.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Matthew N. Krawczyk
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a portable to work alongside my larger professional grade camera.  Takes high quality pictures for a lower end camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: K. Smith "OutlawPlayer2"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes beautiful pictures I cant belive how clear and detailed the pictures are. This is a must buy its easy to use and just plain fun.

Reviews.Title: Picture Perfect
Reviews.Author: keykey05
Reviews.Content: It was a great experience with amazon. I had a camera once exactly like the one I just purchased but it broke so I had to get another one. I wanted a red one this time but could not find one that was brand new so I just settled for the black one which was fine. When it finally arrived, it looked exactly like the one I had before. It wasn't damaged and had no marks or scratches on it. Now that my family know I have another camera they can never tell the difference from when my other camera broke because it looks exactly like the one I had.

Reviews.Title: Great quality but gliches
Reviews.Author: J. Braun
Reviews.Content: I haven't seen anyone else write about this problem so I think it's just my specific camera that has the problem. The memory is internal (it doesn't use a memory card) and there are always several pictures that get corrupted and need to be deleted.Other than that the camera is excellent and I may even purchase another one. It's very compact and easy to use. The picture quality is usually excellent. I was amazed that sometimes indoor pictures are better illuminated with the camera than with the naked eye.I was really surprised at how good the video is. I didn't even intend to use it for that, but I've ended up using it for accoustic music performances. The sound quality is very good. The only problem is when you are zooming in or out, the audio doesn't record.

Reviews.Title: well worth the price
Reviews.Author: peter vegas
Reviews.Content: The dial on top lets you jump from from camera to video mode FAST. Camera can be charged with the battery still in the camera what a concept!! like EVERY cell phone using the included USB wire or the included wall outlet. All casio and canon cameras requires you to take the small battery OUT and place in the  charger. On the overall takes very good snapshots and very good video.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Carol Spicer
Reviews.Content: Great Camera.  You need the flash to make pictures look really good, but very good camera.

Reviews.Title: Samsung L200
Reviews.Author: S. Betley "ctmom"
Reviews.Content: The camera was a Christmas gift from my children...it took fabulous pictures until suddenly without cause, it stopped working.  It would turn on, beep x3 and then shut down not allowing any pictures to be taken.  My children bought the camera with cash from a vending machine at MACY's...they did not retain the receipt.  The serial number on the camera is not fully legible and I am getting NOWHERE with Samsung and their alleged "executive customer service department"....I am on hold to speak with someone no less than 20 minutes...and it's not uncommon to be disconnected after holding to speak with someone for 20 minutes...their customer service is in the Philipines...and NO-ONE there seems to have any authority to do ANYTHING or make any decisions....I am a consumer who expressed the fact that I really loved this camera but I am so disappointed with the alleged 'customer service' and alleged 'warranty'...

ProductInfo.Features:
Color: Black / 10.2 MP / 3x Optical Zoom / 5x Digital Zoom / 2.5-inch color TFT LCD
Shutter Speed: auto: 1 ~ 1/1,500 s, manual: 8 ~ 1/1,500 s
TTL auto focus (Multi AF, Center AF, Face Detection AF)
ISO Equivalent: auto, 80, 100, 200, 400, 800, 1600
Dimensions: 2.2 x 3.45 x 0.8-inches (H x W x D, approximate)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung L200 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Black)
